description: There was an instant attraction between Daniel and Graham, so as a result, they couldn’t keep their hands off each other! Daniel explained how the day was going to turn out, “We’re gonna get wet, we’re gonna get wild!” Graham was grinning from ear to ear, “Fuck yeah, for sure!” We decided to go on a boat and just bask in the great weather…but these two horny studs couldn’t wait any longer, so they fucked right on that boat until Graham blew his load! We knew this was going to be a good one from the get-go!
title: Daniel & Graham: Bareback
